translations: 生产量，投资效益（yield 的复数形式）
[经]生产；投降，[力]屈服（yield 的三单形式）

phrs.translation: 公债利息；债券市场利息率

sentences.sentence: The high yields available on the dividend shares made them attractive to private investors.
sentences.translation: 股息股能获得的高收益使它们对私人投资者们很有吸引力。

sentences.sentence: Soil erosion decreased their crop yields.
sentences.translation: 土壤侵蚀降低了他们的作物产量。

sentences.sentence: Rice yields will be higher than last year.
